Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1974-1975

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.773, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 21 July 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.

Alcohol Beverage Control Board re: Newcomb Hall ABC License, Correspondence from Edgar F. Shannon (Former University President) and Mrs. Hugh Bullock (President of American Association of Poets) Concerning Renewal of American Poets' Poetry Prize at the University from 1975-1979, President Hereford's Acknowledgment for the Alcoa Foundation's Gift to the University, Transactions Culminating in the Establishment of the John S. Alfriend Lecture Fund

Correspondence re: the Reappointment of Anntte Gibbs as the Corporate Representative of the American Association of the University Women, Correspondence from the American Cancer Society Approving Grants for the Varying Areas of Cancer Research
Correspondence--Anderson Brothers' Book Store Gift to the Law School
General--Admission of Athletes, University Agrees to be a Participant in Project Ahead (U.S. Army on Cooperative Education)
Virginia National Bank Summary of Investments, Expenses on 1974 and Proposed 1975 Budget, Auditor's Report and Financial Expose of Alumni Fund

did.unittitle: American Association of State Colleges and Universities 1974-1975
American Association of University Professors--Annual Compensation Survey, Annual Survey of Academic Salary and Fringe Benefit Data 1974-1975
Annual Reports--Equal Opportunities Program Report, Reports of Different Branches of the University 1974-1975
Architecture--General--Landscape Architecture Accreditation Confirmation, Trust Check in Support of the Cary D. Langhorne Chair in Architecture 1974-1975
Art--Bayly Museum--Acknowledgment of the Reception of Art Objects for Charles Barham, Jr., Samuel M. Kootz, The Chrysler Museum at Norfolk, Mr. Myron Brody 1974-1975

Attorney General--State--President Hereford's Rebuttal of Accusations of University Administrative Personnel of "Unauthorized Practice of Law" 1974-1975

"Bn-Bz" Miscellaneous--President Hereford's Acknowledgment of Brown and Williamson's Unrestricted Grant to the University, Correspondence Relating to Carr's Hill Dinner Party Honoring William Buckley and David Halberstam 1974-1975
Barco, James W. (Counselor to the President) 1974-1975
Boar's Head Inn 1968-1969--Report and Correspondence Concerning Possible Land Transaction of Birdwood from the University to the Boar's Head Inn (Permanent) 1974-1975

scopecontent.p: Camp Family History of the University; Acknowledgment of the Union-Camp Corporation's Gift of the Library to the Colgate Darden Business School and Donation; Recommendations to the Century Association (Andrew Miller and R. Phillip Hanes, Jr.); Christmas Card Addressed to the Herefords from Warren Chappel; Joint Will of the Warren Chappels Providing for an Artist-in-Residence; Receipt of Check from Marjorie S. Charles Foundation; Charlottesville Rescue Squad Receipt of $200.00 Donation from the University; Acknowledgment of Research Grant from the Chevron Research Corporation

did.unittitle: "Cl-Cz" Miscellaneous--Acknowledgment of the Check Constituting the Gertrude Watchler Cohen Memorial Foundation; Correspondence Expressing Gratitude for the Grant from Combustion Engineering, Inc.; Minutes of the Board of Directors Meeting of the Council of Southern Universities; Correspondence Acknowledging the west and Cumming Donation of Books to Alderman Library. 1974-1975
Center for Studies in Humanistic Sources 1974-1975
Committee--Admissions--Minutes of April 21, 1975 Admissions Committee Meeting; Report on Committee Activities for Spring Semester 1974-1975 1974-1975
Committee--Arboretum--Minutes of 1974-75 Meetings and First and Second Semester Reports, History of the O.E. White Arboretum 1974-1975
Committee--Calendar and Scheduling--Minutes of March 21, 1975 Meeting; Feb 25, 1975; Feb 29, 1972; March 29, 1972; April 27, 1972; May 17, 1972; and Oct 21, 1972 1974-1975
Committee--Community Colleges--Minutes of March 5, 1975 and December 11, 1974 Meetings 1974-1975

Committee--Future of the University--Minutes of Jan 24, 1975 Meeting; First Annual Report of the Committee 1974-1975
Committee--Institutional Analysis--Correspondence re: Dissolvance of the Committee 1974-1975
Committee--Security and General Safety--Condensed Minutes of Oct 2 and Dec 11, 1974 and Feb 12 and April 19, 1975 Meetings 1974-1975
Committee--University Union--Minutes of Sep 26, Oct 14, Nov 20, Dec 11, 1974 and Jan 22, Feb 12, April 9, and April 23, 1975 Meetings 1974-1975

Counsel to President for Special Development 1974-1975

scopecontent.p: Correspondence Acknowledging Mrs. Patricia J. Edgerton's Gift to the Rare Book Library Fund, Correspondence Thanking Mrs. K.M. Eustace for Her Commemorative Gift to the University; Acknowledgment of Exxon's Designated Contribution

Correspondence Acknowledging the Fleet Foundation Scholarship, Acknowledgment to Mrs. C.T. Montgomery for Her Continued Payment for the Harry D. Forsyth Eminent Scholars Chair in Engineering, Report of the Fourth-Year Servicemen's Opportunity College Project

General Electric Corporate Alumnus Program Gift, Grant from General Services Administration for the Papers of James Madison Project, Correspondence re: Duke of Gloucester's Visit, Correspondence re: Grant from Gulf Oil Foundation for Dr. Hunt's Research

Hereford--Congratulation Letters on Selection as President (2 folders) 1974-1975
